content.rendered:
Sublimated running shorts

Our sublimated running shorts are crafted from 100% polyester, ensuring a lightweight and breathable experience. The durable mesh paneling offers excellent ventilation and reliable fit, perfect for intense workouts and long runs.

Modern Design and Customization

Featuring a sleek two-button placket style and modern HD sublimation embellishment, our running shorts offer a contemporary look. We provide comprehensive print options, allowing for overall designs and vibrant colors tailored to your specifications. Custom labeling and branding are available on demand to meet your unique requirements.

Superior Durability and Finishing

Engineered for durability, our running shorts are finished with quality flatlock work and neat seams. This meticulous attention to detail ensures long-lasting wear and comfort, making them a reliable choice for athletes and fitness enthusiasts.

Versatile Size Range and Minimum Order Quantity

Available in sizes S to 3XL, our sublimated running shorts cater to a wide range of body types. We offer flexible sizing options on demand, with a minimum order quantity (MOQ) of just 40 units. This makes our shorts an ideal choice for sports teams, fitness clubs, and retailers looking for high-quality, customizable athletic wear.

SPOFIT is Offering competitive pricing and customizable options with quality & durability

  • Customization : Labeling & branding on demand
  • Color : Any/On demand
  • Finishing : Flexible & quality stitching work
  • Sizes : S to 3XL (Available on demand)
  • MOQ : 40
